title: ennai nI
sahitya:
ennai nI iniyEnum annai pOl aNaiyAyO cenni malai tannilE sirakkum murugaiyE


anupallavi

  unnaiyE nambinEn uru tuNai enru nAn innalE iniyurAdu inba sukham peravE


caraNam    tannalap-priyanAi dharaNiyil tiriyAmal un arum perumaiyai orupOdum maravAdu
en idaya vAsanAgum unnuDaiya dAsanAgi enrum un padam tanai eNNit-tudi paNNum
